txt.en: Jajax is in the tavern of Lothgobel.\n\nYou should speak with Jajax.
Jajax has agreed to enter into negotiations with you about the fate of Lothgobel.
Make your way to Calembel and speak with someone there
'You won the drinking challenge fair and square, and thus you have our attention.\n\n'You wish to talk? Let us talk. What are your demands?'
Calembel, the main city of Lamedon, can be found south of Lothgobel.\n\nYou should leave the Corsairs to their business and make your way to Calembel.

'Another refugee from Lothgobel, are you? My, but you look like a foreigner....'

You explain that Jajax and the Corsairs have left Lothgobel, and a truce has been reached.

'Oh! Well, that is great news, and unexpected, for we have not the soldiers to keep the enemy at bay.'
